title: Once Yours
description:
Defeat leads you to what you love…
What do friends with benefits and a new job have in common? Usually nothing, unless the guy you ghosted works for your new employer. Tessa Kramer never thought she’d run into Dylan Murphy after she shut down their occasional hook-ups. But ghosting him proves difficult when she discovers he works for her newest client, Somerville Winery and Vineyard. Dylan can’t stop thinking about the one who got away. Realizing his carefree ways are a thing of the past, Tessa has been on his mind ever since she cut him off. And he’s determined to convince her he’s worth a second chance.As their attraction grows outside the bedroom, Dylan turns on the charm to win Tessa back. And you know what they say about second chances…
author: Claire Raye
